title: KHR_materials_pbrClearcoat glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines the clearcoat material layer.

clearcoatFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat layer intensity of the material. A value of 0.0 means the material has no clearcoat layer enabled.

clearcoatTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat texture. Stored in channel R with default value 1.0.

clearcoatRoughnessFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat layer roughness of the material. A value of 0.0 means IOR 0.0 and 1.0 means IOR 0.08. Default is so 0.04.

clearcoatRoughnessTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat roughness texture. Stored in channel G with default value 1.0.

clearcoatUseMaterialRoughness.description: Flag, if material's roughness is used.
clearcoatUseMaterialRoughness.gltf_detailedDescription: If true, the roughness from the underlying material is used and the clearcoat roughness ignored.

clearcoatNormalTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: A tangent space normal map for the clearcoat layer.

clearcoatUseMaterialNormal.description: Flag, if material's normal is used.
clearcoatUseMaterialNormal.gltf_detailedDescription: If true, the normal from the underlying material is used and the clearcoat normal ignored.
